SEARCH
Package model.deckFactory

Class PlayableDeck

java.lang.Object
model.deckFactory.PlayableDeck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Deck
Direct Known Subclasses:
GoldenDeck, ResourcesDeck, StarterDeck
public abstract class PlayableDeck extends Object implements Deck
A base class representing a playable deck of cards. This abstract class provides methods to manipulate and access a collection of PlayableCard objects.
See Also:

  • Field Details

    • cards

      protected ArrayList<PlayableCard> cards
      The list of PlayableCard objects representing the deck of playable cards. This list holds all playable cards that have been added to the deck.

  • Method Details

    • shuffle

      public void shuffle()
      Shuffles the order of cards in the deck. This method randomizes the sequence of cards using the Collections.shuffle() method.
      Specified by:
      shuffle in interface Deck

    • extract

      public PlayableCard extract()
      Removes and returns the first card from the deck.
      Returns:
      The extracted PlayableCard object from the front (head) of the deck.

    • addCard

      public void addCard(PlayableCard card)
      Adds a PlayableCard to the end (tail) of the deck.
      Parameters:
      card - The PlayableCard object to be added to the deck.

    • getCards

      public List<PlayableCard> getCards()
      Retrieves the list of PlayableCard objects in the deck.
      Returns:
      The list of PlayableCard objects currently in the deck.

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Retrieves the current number of cards in the deck.
      Specified by:
      getSize in interface Deck
      Returns:
      The number of PlayableCard objects in the deck.

    • getCard

      public PlayableCard getCard(int id) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Retrieves a PlayableCard from the deck based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the PlayableCard to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The PlayableCard object with the specified ID.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If no PlayableCard with the specified ID is found in the deck.
